TableField.name: HotWorkPermitID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track hot work permits

TableField.name: JobNumber
TableField.phrase: Job Number|The unique number assigned to the job requiring hot work. This number is typically assigned by an engineering or maintenance dapartment

TableField.name: PermitNumber
TableField.phrase: Permit Number|The unique number assigned to the permit used for hot work and placed at the area where the hot work is to be performed. The permit ID can be used as the permit number because it is a unique, automatically generated, numbering system

TableField.name: WorkOrderID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|Numerical ID to identify and track work orders

ForeignField.name: WOOrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: W.O. Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for this work order

ForeignField.name: WOOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: W.O. Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for this work order

ForeignField.name: WorkOrderNo
ForeignField.phrase: Work Order Number|A unique number assigned to the work order. This number is usually assigned by a maintenance and engineering department and is pre-printed on work order forms

ForeignField.name: WorkOrder
ForeignField.phrase: Work Order|The work order associated with the hot work activity when applicable
ForeignField.sample: 3413 | Repair diamond plate walkway on scanner | 02/02/2006 | In Progress

RemoteField.name: RequestTime
RemoteField.phrase: Request Date|The date and time the hot work permit was requested

RemoteField.name: HotWorkTime
RemoteField.phrase: Hot Work Date|The date and time the hot work is scheduled to occur

RemoteField.name: ExpirationTime
RemoteField.phrase: Expiration Date|The date and time the hot work permit is scheduled to expire

TableField.name: HotWorkShiftID
TableField.phrase: Hot Work Shift|The shift during which the hot work is scheduled to occur

CodeField.name: HotWorkShift
CodeField.phrase: Hot Work Shift|The shift during which the hot work is scheduled to occur

TableField.name: HotWorkID
TableField.phrase: Hot Work ID|An automatically assigned number used to track hot work activity throughout the organization

ForeignField.name: OrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization where the hot work activity occurs

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization where the hot work activity occurs

ForeignField.name: LocationID
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific area within the facility where the hot work activity occurs

ForeignField.name: Location
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific area within the facility where the hot work activity occurs
ForeignField.sample: Cold Storage Receiving Area; Cold Storage No. 6

ForeignField.name: HotWorkTypeID
ForeignField.phrase: Hot Work Type|A word or short phrase used to categorize and track the variety of hot work types occurring throughout the organization and streamline risk control administration

ForeignField.name: HotWorkCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group hot works of similar types

CodeField.name: HotWorkCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group hot works of similar types

ForeignField.name: HotWorkType
ForeignField.phrase: Hot Work Type|A word or short phrase used to categorize and track the variety of hot work types occurring throughout the organization and streamline risk control administration

ForeignField.name: HotWorkTitle
ForeignField.phrase: Hot Work Title|A word or short phrase used to identify this specific hot work activity

ForeignField.name: HotWorkDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A detailed description of this hot work activity and any special characteristics associated with the work
ForeignField.sample: The shipping dock plates are frequently repaired as a result of damage caused by lift trucks and shipping trailers. The repairs frequently require the use of welding, grinding and cutting.

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountableID
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing the risks associated with this hot work activity

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing the risks associated with this hot work activity

ForeignField.name: FullWorkPhone
ForeignField.phrase: Work Phone|Telephone number of the individual at their place of work with a lable to identify the number

ForeignField.name: Mobile
ForeignField.phrase: Mobile Phone|Mobile telephone number of the individual with a label to identify the number

ForeignField.name: ContactCard
ForeignField.phrase: Accountable Contact|The contact information of the person assigned primary accountability for managing the risks associated with this hot work activity

ForeignField.name: EmergencyPhone
ForeignField.phrase: Emergency Phone|Telephone number to be called in the case of a hot work emergency

ForeignField.name: LastReviewDate
ForeignField.phrase: Last Review|The date of the last formal review of the hot work activity

ForeignField.name: HotWork
ForeignField.phrase: Hot Work|A combined field used to describe this hot work when associating it with related records
ForeignField.sample: Welding Within the Dry Warehouse; Active Agenda, HQ

TableField.name: Explanation
TableField.phrase: Explanation|An explanation of the hot work to be performed
TableField.sample: A handrail needs to be welded into place on line 1 in the production area. This work will require grinding, torch cutting and arc welding

TableField.name: KeyLearnings
TableField.phrase: Key Learnings|Information learned during the hot work activity which may be useful to others performing similar hot work in the same or similar area
TableField.sample: Cool water should be applied to the feet of the production platform at 30 minute intervals to avoid combustion of the floor.

TableField.name: SpecialHazards
TableField.phrase: Special Hazards|Special hot work hazards that should be captured and recorded so that all persons performing similar entries will be aware of the dangers
TableField.sample: The mix augar switch is mislabeled as the 'Intercom Switch' and can result in inadvertent activation of the mix augar by people trying to use the intercom.

RemoteField.name: PermitIssuedByID
RemoteField.phrase: Permit Issued By|The name of the person issuing the hot work permit

ForeignField.name: PermitIssuedBy
ForeignField.phrase: Permit Issued By|The name of the person issuing the The name of the person issuing the hot work permit

RemoteField.name: SupervisorID
RemoteField.phrase: Supervisor Notified|The supervisor of the area where the hot work is to occur

ForeignField.name: Supervisor
ForeignField.phrase: Supervisor Notified|The supervisor of the area where the hot work is to occur

RemoteField.name: PerformedByID
RemoteField.phrase: Performed By|An automatically assigned number used to associate persons performing hot work activities with permits

ForeignField.name: PerformedBy
ForeignField.phrase: Performed By|Person performing the hot work activity

TableField.name: PerformerRelationshipID
TableField.phrase: Performer Relationship|The relationship of the person performing the hot work activity to the organization where the activity will occur

CodeField.name: PerformerRelationship
CodeField.phrase: Performer Relationship|The relationship of the person performing the hot work activity to the organization where the activity will occur

RemoteField.name: FollowUpReviewByID
RemoteField.phrase: Follow Up Review By|The name of the person conducting the follow-up review of the work area to confirm the area is free of fire hazards

ForeignField.name: FollowUpReviewBy
ForeignField.phrase: Follow Up Review By|The name of the person conducting the follow-up review of the work area to confirm the area is free of fire hazards

RemoteField.name: SafetyCheckByID
RemoteField.phrase: Fire Watch By|The name of the person performing the fire watch safety check to ensure the hot work area is free of residual sparks or heat

ForeignField.name: SafetyCheckBy
ForeignField.phrase: Fire Watch By|Fire Watch By|The name of the person performing the fire watch safety check to ensure the hot work area is free of residual sparks or heat

RemoteField.name: ERTMemberID
RemoteField.phrase: Emergency Response Team Member|The name of the emergency response team member that has been contacted in advance of the hot work and who remains available in the event that a fire response becomes necessary

ForeignField.name: ERTMember
ForeignField.phrase: Emergency Response Team Member|The name of the emergency response team member that has been contacted in advance of the hot work and who remains available in the event that a fire response becomes necessary

ForeignField.name: ERTFullWorkPhone
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Work Phone|Telephone number of the individual at their place of work with a lable to identify the number

ForeignField.name: ERTMobile
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Mobile Phone|Mobile telephone number of the individual with a label to identify the number

ForeignField.name: ERTFullPager
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Pager|Pager number and PIN of the individual

ForeignField.name: ERTContactCard
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Contact|The contact information of the emergency response team member assigned to monitor the hot work activity

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: HotWorkPermit
CombinedField.phrase: Hot Work Permit|A combined field used to describe this hot work permit when associating it with related records

SampleItem.name: 3413 | Repair diamond plate walkway on scanner | 02/02/2006
3414 | Repair steel plate in CEO's head | 02/07/2006
Welding | Welding - Dry Warehouse; Active Agenda, HQ
Welding | Maintenance Shop Welding; Active Agenda, HQ
Welding | Welding - Packaging Area; Active Agenda, HQ
Welding | Food Line Welding; Active Agenda, HQ

EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities with the hot work permit

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with the hot work permit

EditScreen.phrase: Best Practices|Associate best practices with the hot work permit

RecordReportScreen.name: RecordReports
RecordReportScreen.phrase: Reports|View forms and reports associated with hot work permits

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Barriers to success
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific barriers to success in implemeting this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about barriers to success associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Data Collection
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data collection methods, locations, and resources should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about collecting the types of data associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific data input methods, permissions, and requirements should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about inputting the types of data associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific knowledge and information that impacts the subject matter of this module should be entered here. DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific training considerations and requirements should be entered here. DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific knowledge application methods should be entered here. DocumentationSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific questions that are frequently asked of administrators or implementers should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see the types of questions collected, and answers provided, by the Active Agenda community relating to the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
